::Rex/Firearm/Ramhorn/Smokescreen::

Rex runs out of the hatch of the Maximal base, his gun ready. A few 
steps behind him, Firearm emerges, ready to fry any preds in sight. 
The both take position in front of the hatch, waiting for the preds 
to arrive.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramhorn and Smokescreen land at the Cybertronian Fire, morale high 
after their triumphant victory at the Ark. They look around, 
surprised to see all the Maximals ready to defend their base.

Ramhorn frowns. "Maybe one of us should go back to the Ark, in case 
anything is happening there."

Smokescreen looks at Ramhorn. "Allright, see ya."

"Me? I'm not about to leave this, you go!"

Smokescreen keeps silent. Ramhorn sighs. "Fine. See you after the 
battle."

Ramhorn sets off to the Ark, Smokescreen getting in a position near 
the Cybertronian Fire.
